sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import firebase from 'firebase/app' import 'firebase/firestore' import AddComment from './projectActs/AddComment' import PostCredits from './projectActs/PostCredits' import Comments from './projectActs/Comments' const ProjectSummary = ({ project }) => { let comment const db = firebase.firestore() const docRef = db.collection('projects') .doc(project.id).collection('comments') function handleClick(){ docRef.get().then(querySnapshot => { querySnapshot.doc }) } return(
{project.authorFirstName && project.authorFirstName[0]}{project.authorSecondName && project.authorSecondName[0]} {project.authorFirstName} {project.authorSecondName} more_vert

{project.title}

Load comments

{project.createdAt && project.createdAt .toDate() .toLocaleDateString('indian', { year: "numeric", month: "short", day: "numeric" })}

) } export default ProjectSummary
